body_html:
Can you clarify that which of the following algorithm_scratch_size_ is?

  • The scratch size required by algorithm_. It's passed from the DNN library to the user.
  • The memory limit of scratch allocation required by the user. It's passed from the user to the DNN library.

Honestly I'm not sure which one is it in the context...
body_text:

The scratch size required by algorithm_. It's passed from the DNN library to the user.
The memory limit of scratch allocation required by the user. It's passed from the user to the DNN library.

Honestly I'm not sure which one is it in the context...
body:
Can you clarify that which of the following algorithm_scratch_size_ is?
* The scratch size required by algorithm_. It's passed from the DNN library to the user.
* The memory limit of scratch allocation required by the user. It's passed from the user to the DNN library.

Honestly I'm not sure which one is it in the context...
